member.name: MFNETSOURCE_PROTOCOL_TYPE
member.summary: Indicates the type of control protocol that is used in streaming or downloading.

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_PROTOCOL_TYPE.MFNETSOURCE_UNDEFINED
member.summary: The protocol type has not yet been determined.

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_PROTOCOL_TYPE.MFNETSOURCE_HTTP
member.summary: The protocol type is HTTP. This includes HTTPv9, WMSP, and HTTP download.

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_PROTOCOL_TYPE.MFNETSOURCE_RTSP
member.summary: The protocol type is Real Time Streaming Protocol (RTSP).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_PROTOCOL_TYPE.MFNETSOURCE_FILE
member.summary: The content is read from a file. The file might be local or on a remote share.
